content.query:
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 00: Usar la BD Creada
-----------------------------------------------
USE updatalakehousebanco;
GO

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 01: Creacion de tabla de dimension Data
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT * 
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/master/lakehouse/m_party_productos/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 02: Creacion table
-----------------------------------------------

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.m_party_productos
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/master/lakehouse/table_productos/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 ) AS(
    SELECT * 
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/master/lakehouse/m_party_productos/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
)
GO

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 01.1: Prueba de Creacion
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT * from master_party.m_party_productos

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 02: Creacion de vista de tabla
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE VIEW master_party.v_productos AS
SELECT 
codbin,BIN,orden,fechaCarga,is_active,hash_unique
FROM OPENROWSET (
 BULK '/master/lakehouse/table_productos/*.parquet',
 DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
 FORMAT ='PARQUET'
) as [r];

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 03: Validar creaci√≥n de vista
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT * FROM master_party.v_productos

drop EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.m_party_productos go
